description: Try our easy to follow Citrus Scallop Ceviche recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Citrus Scallop Ceviche Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the rind from the orange and lime with a zester. Squeeze the juice from the citrus fruits into a bowl and stir in the rind. Add the scallops and leave to marinate for 25 minutes.
Toss with the tomatoes, onion, chilli and coriander, then season with salt. Pile into scallop shells or serving dishes. Drizzle over the oil and serve.
